On 14.02.2007, at 19:32, Stefan Tilkov wrote:

> I've exchanged emails with Marc Hadley, collected some reactions  
> and published a news item here:
>
> http://www.infoq.com/news/2007/02/jsr-311-java-rest-api

Stefan,

good overview, thanks. Also gives me some hope :-)

I think the JSR provides a good opportunity to discuss REST  
principles in a practical/implementation context. I expect to see a  
lot of "Naa...you cannot do that because..." kinds of discussions  
with associated AHA-Moments - well, if the group accepts my application.

Jan
